code: import axios from'axios';let rooms;let room;let roomTitles=[];const RoomsService={getRooms:async function(){const roomsUrl="/wp-json/wp/v2/rooms?per_page=10";await axios.get(roomsUrl).then(response=>{rooms=response.data;});return rooms;},getRoom:async function(roomId){const roomUrl="/wp-json/wp/v2/rooms/".concat(roomId);await axios.get(roomUrl).then(response=>{room=response.data;});return room;},getRoomTitles:async function(){const roomsUrl="/wp-json/wp/v2/rooms?_fields=title";await axios.get(roomsUrl).then(response=>{if(response.data){response.data.forEach(room=>{roomTitles.push({label:room.title.rendered,value:room.title.rendered});});}});return roomTitles;}};export default RoomsService;
